sentences.en: He hastened home after reading the information in the beeper.
sentences.cn: 看完传呼机上的信息后,他急忙回家了.

sentences.en: His beeper sounded and he picked up the telephone.
sentences.cn: 他的寻呼机响了，于是他拿起了电话。

sentences.en: I'm very sorry , but I've just received an urgent page on my beeper.
It was 11 o'clock when the beeper went off.
Just as he's about to phone home to check on Patty, the beeper 8 goes off!
sentences.cn: 正当他要打电话询问帕蒂的情况时他的寻呼机响了.

sentences.en: Pager is another name for a beeper.
The beeper operators are very busy. You'd better make what you want to say short.
sentences.cn: 寻呼台的小姐很忙, 你就长话短说吧.

sentences.en: Yo mama so fat when her beeper goes off, people thought she was backing up.
sentences.cn: Yomama是如此之肥,当她的Call机响起的时候, 人们以为她要倒车了.

trans.tran_cn: 能发出哔哔声音的仪器
